verbs.description: [ARG0: Infowars host Alex Jones] [V: declared] [ARGM-TMP: during his show on Friday] [ARG1: that the only thing standing between a rogue computer program and the destruction of all humanity is President Donald Trump] .

Infowars host Alex Jones declared during his show on Friday that [ARG1: the only thing] [V: standing] [ARG2: between a rogue computer program and the destruction of all humanity] is President Donald Trump .

Infowars host Alex Jones declared during his show on Friday that [ARG1: the only thing standing between a rogue computer program and the destruction of all humanity] [V: is] [ARG2: President Donald Trump] .
